price: तो जिसने एक कण के बराबर भी नेकी की होगी, उसे देख लेगा।
arabic: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: faman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin khayran yarahu
